thread.section_title: Quality Logo Products, Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Quality Logo Products, Inc. | qualitylogoproducts.com
thread.title: Amanda Howard
thread.title_full: Quality Logo Products, Inc. reviewed by Amanda Howard

author: Amanda Howard
title: Amanda Howard
text: Our company had ordered two products in years past, before I was with the company. QLP found the products based on my vague descriptions and timelines without a hitch. They were super fast, easy and friendly. We got our order quickly. I would highly recommend QLP for those who need promotional products. Leo was great to work with and responded quickly to my questions with all the information I needed. Also, they are nice and real people to talk too! That experience is so appreciated!
